item.title: About Me
item.description:
Introduction

My name is James Derr, but I’m more commonly known as Ryan. I am a dedicated software engineer with a passion for continuous learning and knowledge sharing. When I’m not coding, I enjoy outdoor activities such as bouldering and paddle boarding, and I’m also an avid participant in Dungeons and Dragons campaigns.

Professional Experience

  • Software Engineer At HashiCorp
  • Software Engineer at General Motors
  • Database Administrator at Paycom Payroll

Technical Skills

Programming Languages

  • Java
  • Go
  • Python
  • TypeScript

Cloud Platforms

  • Azure
  • AWS
  • DigitalOcean

Tools and Frameworks

  • Spring
  • Quarkus
  • Apache Camel
  • SQL
  • Kafka
  • Git

Development Lifecycle

  • Kubernetes
  • Docker
  • Terraform
  • ArgoCD
  • Helm
  • CI/CD Pipelines
